title: Potato Slicer Spiral Cutter, Tornado Potato Slicer, Twisted Potato Slicer, Potato Tornado Chips Making Tool, Fancy Fry Chips Gadgets
features: 【Tornado Potato Slicer】The tornado potatoes slicer is very simple to use, and can evenly and thinly sliced, get a wonderful chips on a stick, kids can enjoy their potato tornado any time now.
【Fun Family DIY】The twisted potato slicer are perfect to make spiral potatoes, is a fun way to enjoy fancy potato chips, come and share them with your family and friends.
【Safe Material】The spiral potato slicer are made of food-grade stainless steel and PP, eco-friendly and safe, sturdy and durable, won't hurt your hands and easy clean up.
【Easy to Use】Put spiral cutter through the skewer, get a skewer through the potato, then use handle fixed potato, spiral and sliced. manually operated, convenient to use.

【Wide Application】Excellent and convenient for cutting vegetables into creative spiral form, such as potatoes, carrots, zucchini and cucumbers. Suitable for family dinners, barbecues with friends, picnics, camping
description: A must-have tool for golden crispy potato tornado, hand-cranked rotary slicer, cut out spiral potato strips with uniform thickness, long strips and not easy to break, length can be controlled automatically
